type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Mobs Ignore

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/mobs_ignore)

Makes hostile mobs ignore the player.

Type ID: `apugli:mobs_ignore`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Mobs Ignore

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/mobs_ignore)

Makes hostile mobs ignore the player.

Type ID: `apugli:mobs_ignore`



---

mob_condition.description: If set, this will determine what entity condition the entity must meet in order to be effected by this power.
mob_condition.markdownDescription: If set, this will determine what entity condition the entity must meet in order to be effected by this power.

bientity_condition.description: If set, this will determine what bi-entity condition the entity must meet in order to be effected by this power.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If set, this will determine what bi-entity condition the entity must meet in order to be effected by this power.
